title: IBC Roofing Commission Tracking
blurb: Roofing sales and commission tracking integrated with AccuLynx; dashboards and exports of commission data.

title: FieldwiseCRM
blurb: Complete Sales Operations Platform: territory management, lead tracking, commission calculations, subscription billing.

title: BudMath
blurb: Easily convert medical marijuana allowance decimals into familiar weights (eighths, quarters, prerolls, etc.). So you know how much you can purchase each time.

title: Dot EQ
blurb: Python tool for managing env files in local development across a team.

title: AutoQuery VIN Decoder (WIP)
blurb: Decode VINs into vehicle information from your clipboard or an app. Combined with our Chrome Extension, get real time VIN lookup for the vehicle on the page

title: iRacing Race Scheduler (WIP)
blurb: Track upcoming races and favorites for the sim racing community.
